title: Trump subpoenaed by January 6th committee
description: Former President dismisses hearings, saying the committee is a total "BUST". Also; Britain's Liz Truss under fresh pressure as IMF criticism leaves many of her own MPs in despair, and, we hear about the restaurant for dogs.
itunes:subtitle: Former President dismisses hearings, saying the committee is a total "BUST"
itunes:summary: Former President dismisses hearings, saying the committee is a total "BUST". Also; Britain's Liz Truss under fresh pressure as IMF criticism leaves many of her own MPs in despair, and, we hear about the restaurant for dogs.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
